body: Lisa Allen-Agostini thinks "it’s great that we have begun to think about the question of same-sex marriage in Trinidad and Tobago...[but] we have a long way to go–legally as well as socially–before we can make it an option for our people."
original_body: Lisa Allen-Agostini thinks "it’s great that we have begun to think about the question of same-sex marriage in Trinidad and Tobago...[but] we have a long way to go–legally as well as socially–before we can make it an option for our people."
title: Trinidad & Tobago: Same Sex Marriage

sentence: Lisa Allen-Agostini thinks "it’s great that we have begun to think about the question of same-sex marriage in Trinidad and Tobago...[but] we have a long way to go–legally as well as socially–before we can make it an option for our people."
